abstract: Sources said the investigation into suspected manipulation of the Libor benchmark has led banks to cooperate by sharing information that they say implicates their rivals.
snippet: Sources said the investigation into suspected manipulation of the Libor benchmark has led banks to cooperate by sharing information that they say implicates their rivals.
lead_paragraph: Major banks, which often band together when facing government scrutiny, are now turning on one another as an international investigation into the manipulation of interest rates gains momentum.

headline.main: As Libor Fault-Finding Grows, It Is Now Every Bank for Itself
headline.print_headline: As Libor Fault-Finding Grows, It Is Now Every Bank for Itself

byline.original: By Azam Ahmed and Ben Protess
